alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Henry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Defiance, northern Henry and southeastern Fulton Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Napoleon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Napoleon, Liberty Center, Mcclure, Texas, Malinta, Florida, Colton, Grelton, Ridgeville Corners, Okolona and Gerald. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
